name: Ares, the Knight God Emperor
text: Continuous: Your [Race:Knight of the Round Table] resonators gain [+100/+100]. Enter: You may put any number of [Addition:Resonator] cards from your hand and/or your graveyard on this card. Continuous: Each [Addition:Resonator] on this card affects this card as though this card is a resonator. Activate. : Produce for each [Race:Knight of the Round Table] resonator in your field.
